categoryData.displaySubtitle: I lost my phone, I lost my card...

helpArticles.question: Reporting a lost, damaged or stolen card

answer.answer:
If your card's lost, damaged or stolen, it's easy to order a new one üíÅ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

1. Tap the __Home__ icon in the menu bar
2. Tap the __Account__ button under your Monzo card (if you can't find this button, swipe down on your list of payments)
3. Tap __My card is lost or stolen__ or __My card is damaged or broken__

__Reporting a stolen card üí≥__

If your card's been stolen, or you've seen transactions that look fraudulent, please make sure your card stays frozen until your replacement arrives. You should also tell us about this in the app: 

1. Tap the __Help__ icon in the menu bar
2. Search ‚ÄòReporting a lost, damaged or stolen card‚Äô
3. Tap __get in touch__ near the end of the article

helpArticles.question: Can I take out cash on my Monzo card?

answer.answer:
You can use your card at any Mastercard ATM (you should be able to see the small Mastercard logo on it).

To find Mastercard ATM's, just follow the link below üöÄ

https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/consumers/get-support/locate-an-atm.html

helpArticles.question: How do I make a complaint?

answer.answer:
If you would like to make a complaint, please get in touch and we will look into this as soon as possible. 

If you want to make a complaint about your business account, [tap here for instructions](monzo://help_topic/legal-complaint-business-account).

__App:__ If you are a customer, you can send us a message through the App Chat.

__Phone:__ Our calls teams are happy to speak to you and will raise a complaint for you. Call us on 0800 802 1281 or +44 203 872 0620 when calling from abroad.

__Email:__ email us at complaints@monzo.com

__Post:__ If you‚Äôd prefer, you can put your complaint in writing and send it to:

Customer Advocacy Team, 
38 Finsbury Square, 
Finsbury, 
London, 
EC2A 1PX


__What happens next?__

We will be in-touch within 3 business days to try and resolve your issue for you. If we are unable to resolve your complaint in this time, you should know that we're typically allowed up to 15 business days, or in some cases up to 8 weeks to investigate a complaint and produce what is referred to as our final response.
If you are unhappy with our final response, you have the right to refer your complaint to the Financial Ombudsman Service, free of charge ‚Äì but you must do so within six months of the date of our final response.


The Ombudsman‚Äôs address is:
Financial Ombudsman Service,
Exchange Tower,
London,
E14 9SR

They can be reached by phone at 0800 023 4567 or 0300 123 9123 . Or, you can visit their website [here](https://www.financial-ombudsman.org.uk/consumer/complaints.htm).

You can also see an online version of their consumer leaflet [here](https://www.financial-ombudsman.org.uk/publications/consumer-leaflet.htm).

Don't want to complain but want to give us feedback? 
Please share your thoughts in the Community Forum or via the App Chat and we'll ensure this information is passed on to the relevant team.

If you put the wrong PIN in too many times when making a payment, we block your card to keep it safe üîí

Follow these steps to recover your PIN:

1. Tap the __Home__ icon in the menu bar
2. Tap the __PIN & card number__ button under your Monzo card (if you can't find this button, swipe down on your list of payments)
3. Tap __Get a PIN reminder__

You'll need to show some ID and take a photo of your face üì∏

If you‚Äôve lost your phone and Monzo card, [Monzo Web](https://web.monzo.com/) lets you freeze your card and check your latest payments ‚Äì so you can get back to normal faster.

__Accessing Monzo Web üíª__

1. Go to [web.monzo.com](https://web.monzo.com/)
2. Enter the email address linked to your Monzo account
3. Check your email for a magic link to sign in

__Using Monzo Web üíÅ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è__

You can use Monzo Web to:

- Freeze and defrost your card
- Find your recent payments
- View all your accounts
- Check your account balance

__Still stuck?__

You can also call or email us, and we‚Äôll be able to log you out of your Monzo account remotely.

- [0800 802 1281](tel://08008021281) from the UK
- [+44 20 3872 0620](tel://00442038720620) from abroad
- [help@monzo.com](mailto:help@monzo.com)

If you think you‚Äôve been the victim of fraud, please take the following steps: 

__Freeze your card__

This stops anyone from using your card while we investigate what's happened.

1. Tap the __Home__ icon in the menu bar of your app
2. Tap the __Freeze__ button under your Monzo card (if you can't find this button, swipe down on your list of payments)

__Get in touch__

1. Tap the __Help__ icon in the menu bar of your app
2. Search ‚ÄòReporting fraud‚Äô
3. Tap __Get in touch__ at the bottom of the article
